Name: Super Puzzle Platformer Deluxe
About the game: The title says it all. Take one part falling block puzzle game, combine one part old-school platformer, add a couple thousand pixels, blend and serve. Why match colored blocks when you can just shoot the hell out of them? Your goal is to survive as long as you can. From celebrated indie developer Andrew Morrish and Adult Swim Games. Key Features Nov. 2013 Update: new outfit, new level, new challenges and MORE! 9 playable characters, each with unique abilities 7 different worlds to explore Dozens of obstacles, hazards and enemies 20+ challenges to overcome Play single player or local head-to-head multi-player Amazing soundtrack Leaderboards support 30+ Steam achievements
